column4: i have debian installed with LVM and I am running the ubuntu 9.04 live cd, how do i mount LVM partitions? all i see is a 255mb partition
This may apply to your situation: http://www.brandonhutchinson.com/Mounting_a_Linux_LVM_volume.html
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=238984 explains what I have to do but would you know what I would need to change in that command for it to apply to my situation?
I'm not sure, that would more than likely be system specific.
